relation: You can walk around day or night and feel totally safe.
There's not really Greek life, but social clubs instead which will be fun to join and make tons of friends.
There's a shop called Best Donuts, and believe me, they were the best donuts I have ever tasted. Also, there's a theater on campus where you can watch movies for free!
I will say the dorm rooms weren't that extraordinary, but it's okay. The friendship you will gain in it will make up for it.

I sat in a General Psychology Class, and I understood what the professor was talking about. Still to this day, I remember everything of what he taught that day. The professors want you to succeed, so ask them if you need help in a particular area.
Please visit the campus! Freed wasn't an option in my mind until I saw how beautiful the campus was and the experiences it presented me!
I love the Christian atmosphere Freed portrays, and its environment is very friendly and safe on campus and the neighborhood around. I was just visiting for the weekend and I already felt at home.
pageTitle: Freed-Hardeman University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 01/13/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 2 people found this inaccurate. 1 of 23 Brittany from West Point, MS Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Christians who are wanting to live the way God wants them to. People who are looking for a good education. Tips for prospective students Start looking for money/scholarship/grants/etc NOW. Get involved with and go to stuff going on at Freed like: Makin Music, Lectureships, Maroon and Gold Days, and everything else they have to offer. Bang for the buck Freed can be a little more expensive compared to other colleges. But the christian atmosphere can't be beat and the education you will gain from Freed will better prepare you for the future. I'd rather pay a little more for a school like Freed than some community college. Will enjoy being here Freed has a great christian atmosphere and lots of activities to be involved in. If it's just a devotional, sports, or whatever! Will learn a lot I have been able to sit in on a few classes and was blown away every time! The teachers seem to be great and want to help you do well!
